# **Government Tender Announcement**

### **Call for Bids: 7 Medium Trucks for Correctional Service of Canada**

**Notice Number:** WS3715779098
**Publication Date:** April 26, 2024
**Closing Date:** May 3, 2024 - 14:00ें

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking to acquire seven (7) medium trucks of multiple configurations from Group 3, as per RFSA E60HP-16TRUK-B. The trucks are to be delivered to various locations throughout Canada. This bid solicitation is open to suppliers who hold an awarded Supply Arrangement (SA) under RFSA E60HP-16TRUK-B Group 3 Truck, Medium.

**Supplier Eligibility:**

To participate in this bid process, suppliers must have an active Supply Arrangement (SA) under RFSA E60HP-16TRUK-B Group 3 Truck, Medium. If a supplier wishes to become pre-qualified under this RFSA, they can refer to tender opportunities on CanadaBuys.

**Bid Requirements:**

* Suppliers must submit all required supporting documentation and bids by May 3, 2024, at 14:00 HAE.
* Late bids will be considered non-responsive.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to suppliers who submitted an offer on the previous solicitation.

**Trade Agreements:**

This bid solicitation is compliant with the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information:**

For more information on this bid solicitation, please contact Jacques Legault from the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) at jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
